definition: (archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms

sentences.english: Objective To study the technique to control rodents in sewers of urban residential areas.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究武漢市居民區下水道滅鼠技術。

sentences.english: The community of Meado Wood, adjoined the southwest limits of the airfield .
sentences.chinese: 梅多伍德的居民區和機場的西南邊緣接壤。

sentences.english: So there's no residence at all.
The first are the large factories in residential areas or close to water sources.
sentences.chinese: 第一個就是處在居民區或者鄰近水源的大工廠。

sentences.english: And so it happened that our neighborhood had become a vast acreage of sterling ice.
sentences.chinese: 於是我們家這一居民區就變成一大片純淨的冰面。

sentences.english: The raging flames lit up the whole district.
sentences.chinese: 熊熊的火光照亮了整個的居民區。

sentences.english: The shelters will be located in the heart of residential communities.
sentences.chinese: 這些庇護所將在居民區的中心地帶設立。

sentences.english: Seedörfl is a small collection of houses, the surrounding landscape is flat.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個小居民區，周圍都是平地。

sentences.english: It was quite exciting – it sort of hovered past the houses.
sentences.chinese: 這一切十分令人激動，它像是盤旋飛過了居民區。

sentences.english: There are only two crimes this year so far in my neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，今年我們居民區才發生了兩起犯罪案。

sentences.english: Crumbling neighborhoods have been spruced up with fresh coats of paint.
sentences.chinese: 老舊的居民區被刷上新的顏色，打扮得漂漂亮亮。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is effective to control rodent according to the operational instruction in the residential areas.
sentences.chinese: 結論按操作規程滅鼠能有效控制居民區下水道家棲鼠。

sentences.english: Instead, I would use buses to deliver fresh milk to housing blocks.
sentences.chinese: 我啊，我會利用公交系統將鮮奶送到居民區。

sentences.english: Don't ②lay into your drum kit at midnight in a residential area.
sentences.chinese: 午夜時分，不要在居民區敲打你的架子鼓。
現在是商業區和居民區。

sentences.english: The attacks took place in a residential district of western Istanbul.
sentences.chinese: 襲擊發生在伊斯坦布爾西部一個居民區。
